issue.title: [Python] Race condition in `write_to_dataset`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1980](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1980). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
One race condition when creating directories was fixed in #1902, but a race condition still exists when using `partition_cols`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1980?focusedCommentId=16321194) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1468
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1468>
